text: David W. Kendall (February 11, 1903 – December 27, 1976) was an American attorney who served as the White House Counsel to President Dwight D. Eisenhower from 1958 to 1961. ==References== Category:1903 births Category:1976 deaths Category:People from Indianapolis Category:White House Counsels Category:Michigan Republicans
title: David W. Kendall
